site.list.schema.name: Site Name
site.setting.tour.basicInfo: Describe the location, address, location type (office, factory...etc.), area size, number of users, and list of companies using the location...etc.
site.setting.tour.significance: Assess the level of greenhouse gas emissions from each emission source, the ease of obtaining information, and the level of accuracy associated with the data
site.setting.tour.emission: Greenhouse gas emission sources (referred to as emission sources) refer to facilities, units or processes that directly or indirectly emit greenhouse gases into the atmosphere. In the system, we first need to establish an emission source project, And evaluate the significance of each emission source to determine whether to collect activity data for this project.
site.setting.tour.equipment: If the user wants to mark the equipment items of the base, such as the ice water host, and record the detailed information of the equipment, such as the brand, location (such as basement area A), maintenance personnel... etc. Information, you can build equipment projects here and bind them to emission sources.
site.setting.tour.operation.process: If the user wants to mark the activity items of the base and record the detailed information of the equipment, such as location, maintenance personnel... and other information, they can create the activity items here and combine them with the emissions Source binding.
site.setting.tour.resourceCoefficient: Set the raw materials or products used by greenhouse gas emission sources here, and maintain the dependent greenhouse gas emission coefficients based on the year.
site.setting.tour.overview: Through the overview, software users can understand the carbon distribution status of the site at different times, and effectively analyze and identify major carbon emission items.
site.setting.schema.equipment.name: Equipment Name
site.setting.schema.name: Name
site.setting.schema.coefficient.name: Coefficient Name
site.setting.schema.lossMethod.info: Loss methods are divided into "Other loss" and "Refrigerant loss". Examples of other loss include the escape of non-refrigerants such as septic tanks and fire extinguishers.
site.setting.schema.calculate.method.inf: When the emission source loss method is "refrigerant", the calculation method provides "Filling method" and "Loss method" for selection.
site.setting.schema.unit.display.hint: { resourceUnit } is the unit value set for "GHG Factor", so it is converted to the factor unit display.

significance.difficulty.3: Members of the Inventory Implementation Committee can be obtained directly within the organization
significance.difficulty.2: Must be obtained by external organization
significance.difficulty.1: No relevant (appropriate) environmental information or cannot be evaluated
significance.accuracy.3: Activity data is automatically measured continuously
